title: PRBC signs MoU with Discover Pakistan TV to boost tourism, trade
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 08 (APP): Pakistan Romania Business Council (PRBC) and Discover Pakistan have signed a landmark Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) to boost bilateral trade, tourism, and economic cooperation between Pakistan and Romania.
The MoU, signed by Dr. Kaiser Rafiq, Chairman of Discover Pakistan TV Channel, and Mr. Sohail Shamim Firpo, Chairman of PRBC, aims to leverage Discover Pakistan’s digital platforms to showcase Pakistan’s industrial capabilities, history, and economic significance, as well as Romania’s industrial strength and key sectors, said a PRBC press release received here.
Atif Farooqi, Advisor and Chief Operating Officer of PRBC, emphasized the significance of this partnership, stating that it will highlight the vast trade and investment opportunities between Pakistan and Romania, and promote growth and cooperation in key sectors.
This development is the latest in a series of efforts to strengthen bilateral ties between Pakistan and Romania. Previously, the Embassy of Romania and PRBC signed a protocol agreement to enhance economic cooperation and bilateral trade.
